Our story

Being the second generation in handcrafted manufacturing in Indonesia, Bastiaan has combined decades of production experience with his view on natural, timeless design, creating byE.

Read more

Our history begins in Indonesia

Bastiaan grew up in Indonesia where he was exposed to the furniture industry at a young age. Thirty years prior his parents, Leuntje and Douwe, started a furniture company in Java. From the start the company has been producing furniture on a large scale for renowned European brands.

At the age of thirty, Bastiaan revisited Indonesia to try and raise his parents’ company to a higher level. The core business of his parents was to make customized products for European brands. Bastiaan saw an opportunity to design an entire collection himself and offer it to international customers. He offered his own designs to contemporary wholesale brands and before he knew it his white label collection was being sold on a large scale all over the world; from Australia, Asia, the US, Europe, the Middle East to Latin America.

The following year ByE participated at the largest European furniture fair in Paris, Maison & Objet, where it received a prize for the best designed chair the first time it participated. At the Jakarta fair ByE received prizes for the best stand. The newcomer was receiving recognition from both the customers ordering all over the world and the industry itself giving out prizes for the designs. Bastiaan finds it essential that the ByE collection is contemporary, complete and innovative, combining Indonesian craftsmanship with Western design influences. In addition, the collection can easily be combined with different interior styles.

Designed only by Bastiaan himself

Firstly, Bastiaan designs the products he wants to see in the collection. He keeps in mind that the products need to be compatible with different styles, but still distinctive enough to give it personality, albeit neutral and timeless. After the development phase the collection will be produced in the Elements Factory.

Bastiaan exposes his annual new collection at international furniture fairs where buyers can order his products by the container. As soon as the order has been placed the products will be made in the factory. A sea freight container will be filled with the products and will be shipped to the customer’s destination. As soon as the ship is at sea, the container with the products will become the property of the customer.

Our collection is full of contemporary, complete and fresh products that customers can buy and resell under their own brand. The style is natural, handcrafted and calm.

Our extensive experience and broad collection that blend well with your own brand are a few factors that make us unique

We are a European company that has its roots entrenched in Indonesia. We understand the local as well as the international side of the production process and supply chain. Extensive experience, unique designs, control over the production process, understanding the needs of different markets, clear communication and innovation in a dynamic furniture industry are a few sharp advantages that we offer.

Why work with us

About by E

ByE provides an expanding collection of natural, timeless interior that is produced at the source. We brand the products with your own label and ship them to anywhere in the world.
